Case.Query2: Create table E011_012 (SMINTD1 SMALLINT,SMINTD2 SMALLINT,SMINTD3 SMALLINT,Primary key(SMINTD1))

Case.Query6: SELECT CAST(CHARD2 as VARCHAR(30)) from E021_10

Case.NameCase: E051-04 GROUP BY can contain columns not in '<select list>'
Case.Query1: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PersonsNew GROUP BY Country;

SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS PersonCount from PersonsNew GROUP BY Country HAVING COUNT(*) > 2

Test5.Name: E061 Basic predicates and search conditions

Case.Query1: CREATE TABLE Computers (ID int ,Model varchar(255),SpeedCPU int,Ram int,HDD int,Price float,Primary key(ID));
Case.Query9: SELECT * FROM Computers WHERE SpeedCPU >= 600 and Price < 1000

Case.Query1: SELECT model, SpeedCPU FROM Computers WHERE Price BETWEEN 500 AND 900;

Case.NameCase: E061-03 IN predicate with list of values
Case.Query1: SELECT model, HDD FROM Computers WHERE HDD IN (128,500);
SELECT * FROM Computers WHERE Model LIKE '10%';
CREATE TABLE Escapepred (Name varchar(25));
Case.Query8: SELECT Name FROM Escapepred WHERE Name LIKE '%#_%' ESCAPE '#'

Case.Query1: Insert into Computers (ID,Model,SpeedCPU,Ram,HDD,Price) values (5,'1360','2600','4096',null,2000.00);
Case.Query3: SELECT * FROM Computers where HDD IS NULL
Case.Query4: SELECT * FROM Computers where HDD IS NOT NULL

Case.Query1: ALTER TABLE Computers ADD Namecompany Varchar(100)
Case.Query3: UPDATE Computers SET Namecompany = 'INTEL' WHERE Id IN (0,3)
Case.Query4: UPDATE Computers SET Namecompany = 'ASUS' WHERE Id IN (1,2)
Case.Query5: UPDATE Computers SET Namecompany = 'AMD' WHERE Id IN (4,5)
Case.Query7: CREATE TABLE Company (ID int, NameCompany Varchar(100), TypeProduct Varchar(20),Primary key(ID));
Case.Query16: SELECT NameCompany FROM Company WHERE TypeProduct = 'pc' AND NOT NameCompany = ANY (SELECT NameCompany FROM Computers);
Case.Query17: SELECT NameCompany FROM Company WHERE TypeProduct = 'pc' AND NOT NameCompany = SOME (SELECT NameCompany FROM Computers);

Case.Query1: Insert into Company (ID,NameCompany,TypeProduct) values (6,'ASUS','printer');
Case.Query3: SELECT NameCompany FROM Company as C1 WHERE TypeProduct = 'pc' AND EXISTS (SELECT NameCompany FROM Company WHERE TypeProduct = 'printer' and NameCompany = C1.NameCompany);

Case.Query1: SELECT Model FROM Computers WHERE NameCompany = (SELECT NameCompany FROM Company WHERE NameCompany = 'ASUS' AND TypeProduct = 'pc');
SELECT Model FROM Computers WHERE SpeedCPU IN(SELECT SpeedCPU FROM Computers WHERE SpeedCPU IN (2600,960));

Case.NameCase: E061-12 Subqueries in quantified comparison predicate
Case.Query1: SELECT DISTINCT NameCompany FROM Company WHERE TypeProduct = 'pc' AND NameCompany = (SELECT DISTINCT NameCompany FROM Company WHERE NOT NameCompany = ANY (SELECT NameCompany FROM Computers));
SELECT Id, Model, NameCompany FROM Computers C1 WHERE SpeedCPU = (SELECT MAX(SpeedCPU) from Computers C2 where C1.Id = C2.Id);
SELECT Model, Price FROM Computers WHERE SpeedCPU > 800 AND HDD < 512;
CREATE TABLE Laptop (ID int ,Model varchar(255),SpeedCPU int,Ram int,HDD int,Price float, Namecompany varchar(100),Primary key(ID));
Case.Query10: SELECT Price FROM Computers UNION SELECT Price FROM Laptop

Case.Query1: SELECT Price FROM Computers UNION ALL SELECT Price FROM Laptop
SELECT Price FROM Laptop EXCEPT SELECT Price FROM Computers

Case.NameCase: E071-05 Columns combined via table operators need not have exactly the same data type
Case.Query1: SELECT Price FROM Laptop UNION SELECT Namecompany FROM Computers
Case.Query2: SELECT Price FROM Laptop UNION ALL SELECT Namecompany FROM Computers

Case.Query1: SELECT distinct Namecompany FROM Company WHERE Namecompany in (SELECT Namecompany FROM Computers WHERE Price < 1000 UNION ALL SELECT Namecompany FROM Laptop WHERE Price < 2000)

CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER DECCURS1
before update on Company
AS
DECLARE cursor1 CURSOR for
(select id, namecompany, typeproduct from company where typeproduct = 'pc');
BEGIN
end

Case.NameCase: E121-02 ORDER BY columns need not be in select list
Case.Query1:
CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER DECCURS2
before update on Company
AS
DECLARE cursor2 CURSOR for
(select id, namecompany from company order by typeproduct);
begin
end

Case.NameCase: E121-03 Value expressions in ORDER BY clause
Case.Query1:
CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER DECCURS3
before update on Company
AS
DECLARE cursor3 CURSOR for
(select id, namecompany, typeproduct as type from company order by type);
begin
end

CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER DECCURS4
before update on Company
AS
DECLARE cursor4 CURSOR for
(select id, namecompany from company order by namecompany desc);
begin
open cursor4;
end

Case.NameCase:
F041-01 Inner join (but not necessarily
the INNER keyword)
Case.Query1: SELECT a.agent_name, c.cust_name FROM customer c JOIN agents a ON a.agent_code = c.agent_code
CREATE TABLE A( A INT, B INT, C INT)
Case.Query3: CREATE TABLE B( A INT, B INT, D INT)
Case.Query5: SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD FROM A INNER JOIN B ON A.B <= B.B

Case.Query1:
SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A LEFT JOIN B ON A.B = B.B

SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A RIGHT JOIN B ON A.B = B.B

Case.NameCase: F041-05 Outer joins can be nested
Case.Query1: SELECT a.agent_name, c.cust_name FROM customer c RIGHT JOIN (select * from agents where commission > 0.13) a ON a.agent_code = c.agent_code

Case.NameCase: F041-07 Outer joins can be nested
Case.Query1:
SELECT a.agent_name, c.cust_name FROM customer c RIGHT JOIN
(select c.cust_name, a.agent_name, a.agent_code from customer c right join agents a ON a.agent_code = c.agent_code
and a.commission > 0.13 where c.payment_amt > 5000) a
ON a.agent_code = c.agent_code

Case.NameCase:
F041-08 All comparison operators are
supported (rather than just =)
Case.Query1:
SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A RIGHT JOIN B ON A.B < B.B
Case.Query3:
SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A RIGHT JOIN B ON A.B > B.B
Case.Query5:
SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A RIGHT JOIN B ON A.B != B.B
Case.Query7:
SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A RIGHT JOIN B ON A.B <= B.B
Case.Query9:
SELECT A.A AS AA, A.B AS AB, A.C AS AC, B.A AS BA, B.B AS BB, B.D AS BD
FROM A RIGHT JOIN B ON A.B >= B.B

F131 UNION and EXCEPT in

Case.NameCase:
F131-01 WHERE, GROUP BY, and
HAVING clauses supported in
queries with grouped views

Case.Query7: SELECT namecompany FROM F131_01 WHERE price > 1000 GROUP BY namecompany HAVING COUNT(model) > 2

F131-02 Multiple tables supported in
queries with grouped views

queries with grouped views

F131-04 Subqueries with GROUP BY
and HAVING clauses and
grouped views

Case.NameCase:
F131-05 Single row SELECT with
GROUP BY and HAVING
clauses and grouped views

CREATE TABLE F261_01 (ROW_ID INT NOT NULL,SALES_NUM NUMERIC,SALES_STATUS CHAR(20))
Case.Query14:
SELECT f.sales_num,
  CASE f.sales_status
    WHEN 'Open' THEN ''
    WHEN 'Waiting' THEN ' '
    WHEN 'Shipped' THEN ''
    WHEN 'Closet' THEN ''
    ELSE ' !!'
  END
 FROM F261_01 f

Case.Query1:
SELECT f.sales_num,
  CASE
    WHEN f.sales_status = 'Open' THEN ''
    WHEN f.sales_status = 'Waiting' THEN ' '
    WHEN f.sales_status = 'Shipped' THEN ''
    WHEN f.sales_status = 'Closet' THEN ''
    ELSE ' !!'
  END
 FROM F261_01 f

SELECT
  NULLIF(1,1) A,
  NULLIF(1,2) B,
  NULLIF(NULL, NULL) C,
  NULLIF(1, NULL) D,
  NULLIF(NULL, 1) E
FROM
  RDB$DATABASE

SELECT f.sales_num, COALESCE(f.sales_num,' ')
FROM f261_01 f

CREATE SCHEMA AUTHORIZATION oe
   CREATE TABLE new_product 
      (color VARCHAR2(10)  PRIMARY KEY, quantity NUMBER) 
   CREATE VIEW new_product_view 
      AS SELECT color, quantity FROM new_product WHERE color = 'RED' 
   GRANT select ON new_product_view TO hr

Case.NameCase:
F311-02 CREATE TABLE for persistent
base tables
Case.Query1:
CREATE SCHEMA AUTHORIZATION oe
   CREATE TABLE new_product 
      (color VARCHAR2(10)  PRIMARY KEY, quantity NUMBER) 
   CREATE VIEW new_product_view 
      AS SELECT color, quantity FROM new_product WHERE color = 'RED' 
   GRANT select ON new_product_view TO hr

CREATE SCHEMA AUTHORIZATION oe
   CREATE TABLE new_product 
      (color VARCHAR2(10)  PRIMARY KEY, quantity NUMBER) 
   CREATE VIEW new_product_view

     VALUES (cd.agent_code)

MERGE

   USING (SELECT * FROM agents WHERE commission > 0.18) cd
   ON (c.agent_code = cd.agent_code)

Case.Query8: CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER F831_01_CURS FOR F831_01 ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0 AS DECLARE f831_01_cursor CURSOR FOR (SELECT StateName, StateAbbr FROM F831_01 FOR UPDATE); DECLARE @StateName varchar(50); DECLARE @StateAbbr char(2); OPEN f831_01_cursor; FETCH NEXT FROM f831_01_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr; WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN IF (@StateAbbr = 'WA') UPDATE F831_01 SET StateName = 'California', StateAbbr = 'CA' WHERE CURRENT OF f831_01_cursor; IF (@StateAbbr = 'OR') UPDATE F831_01 SET StateName = 'Arizona', StateAbbr = 'AZ' WHERE CURRENT OF f831_01_cursor; FETCH NEXT FROM f831_01_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr; END

Case.Query1: CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER F831_02_CURS FOR F831_01 ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0 AS DECLARE f831_02_cursor CURSOR SCROLL FOR SELECT StateName, StateAbbr FROM F831_01 ORDER BY StateName; SELECT StateName, StateAbbr FROM F831_01 ORDER BY StateName;DECLARE @StateName varchar(50); DECLARE @StateAbbr char(2); OPEN f831_02_cursor; FETCH LAST FROM f831_02_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr; SELECT @StateName, @StateAbbr; FETCH PRIOR FROM f831_02_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr; SELECT @StateName, @StateAbbr; FETCH ABSOLUTE 2 FROM f831_02_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr;SELECT @StateName, @StateAbbr; FETCH RELATIVE 2 FROM f831_02_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr; SELECT @StateName, @StateAbbr; FETCH RELATIVE -3 FROM f831_02_cursor INTO @StateName, @StateAbbr; SELECT @StateName, @StateAbbr;

Case.Query7: CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE CardinalityChecker (card1 integer, card2 integer, card3 integer) as DECLARE array10 string10; DECLARE array1000 string1000; DECLARE array30000 string30000; BEGIN card1 = MAX_CARDINALITY(array10); card2 = MAX_CARDINALITY(array1000); card3 = MAX_CARDINALITY(array30000); END;

Case.Query1: CREATE OR ALTER FUNCTION array_trim(text[]) RETURNS text[] AS DECLARE text ALIAS FOR $1; retVal text[]; BEGIN FOR I IN array_lower(text, 1)..array_upper(text, 1) LOOP retVal[I] := trim(text[I]); END LOOP; RETURN retVal; END;
